import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const RoomCard = ({ room }) => { const { id, title, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews } = room; return
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{""} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
}; export default RoomCard;
